JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Help us a weekend in July for a field experiment for the Beacon Project during Tour de France
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Are you free over the first weekend of July 2022? Do you want to make the most of a “day at work” outside the university in a fun and interactive environment? Do you need to cover those extra hours of work after the month of exams and with a view to the upcoming holidays?

Join our experimental staff for a day or two!

As part of the our big Beacon Project project, we are going to run a field experiment during the event FestiVelo organised by the Københavns Kommune in combination with the Tour de France. The experiment will take place at Fælledsparken on Friday 1st AND on Saturday 2nd of July 2022.

For that, we are recruiting a number of student assistants to join our experimental staff.

The BEACON project explores the behavioral changes towards sustainable lifestyles that support the building of a Circular Society. More specifically, this experiment seeks to investigate food choices and price sensitiveness of participants in a social context, like the one of a festival, with a focus towards the green food option (vegetarian/vegan). You can read more about the project in our website and feel free to contact us to have more details about it.

Preferably, we are looking for students who are fluent in Danish but also feel comfortable with English, since the job consists of interacting with the participants of the public event. Students should be able to confirm their availability for at least a full day over the weekend, which means one or also both days of the event.

In addition, we ask you to participate a few hours in a training session some weeks before the event to prepare for the key role covered during the experiment.

In short, the job mainly consists in recruiting people during the event, explaining them the rules for participating in the experiment, guiding them through a short survey and distributing vouchers to be used in the food area of the park.

All hours will be covered by the hourly salary established by the CBS regulation on the matter.

Should you have any questions you are more than welcome to reach out to Camilla Fjeldberg Jensen cfj.msc@cbs.dk

Apply through the link at the bottom on the page.

Ansøgningsfrist: 12. maj 2022.

WE TRANSFORM SOCIETY WITH BUSINESS

CBS er et globalt anerkendt business universitet med dybe rødder i den nordiske, socioøkonomiske model. Vi har et bredt fokus på erhvervslivets og samfundets udfordringer i det 21. århundrede. Derfor har vi en samlet portefølje af tværfaglig forskning og uddannelse af høj kvalitet, der har styrket generationer af fagfolk og ledere i den private sektor og andre steder.

Universitetet ligger på Frederiksberg og har ca. 21.000 fuldtids- og deltidsstuderende, 760 fuldtidsansatte videnskabelige medarbejdere, 210 ph.d.-studerende og 680 administrative medarbejdere samt en portefølje af bachelor-, kandidat-, MBA/EMBA-, ph.d.-og efter-/videreuddannelser udbudt på både dansk og engelsk.

Med vores globale profil følger en forpligtelse til at bidrage til udviklingen af transformative kompetencer hos studerende, kandidater og virksomhedsledere gennem vores uddannelsesaktiviteter og muligheder for livslang læring. Komplekse udfordringer kræver en fælles indsats, og derfor fokuserer vores strategi på at styrke nuværende og starte nye partnerskaber med andre videnskaber, erhvervslivet, myndigheder og civilsamfundet.
